items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, feels silky. Doesnt break the bank!
items.body: I got a small based on reading reviews of others with a smaller bust size, and that was a good call. I'm 5'7" and smaller on top, and a small fit me great. I wasn't worried very much about it falling down since there is a rubber strip at the top which helps the top stay on and feel secure. The light blue color was beautiful, and the material felt great. I do wish it was a tad bit longer, but it's a small nitpick for something that overall looks great, makes me feel great, and wasn't too expensive. Overall had a great night partying in this dress and will be keeping it for future events! Read more
items.author: Austin Z

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Such a beautiful dress! The quality, especially for the price is sooo nice! Itâ€™s a thicker silk so youâ€™re not wearing a cheap piece of fabric. The dress is super flattering and tight in the right places. It will show sweat if you sweat so beware of the under â€œchestâ€ sweat if you donâ€™t wear a bra. Itâ€™s nice that the top is snug enough to stay up but also not giving that armpit overhang. Really beautiful!! Read more
items.author: AvaJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just not right for me
items.body: I loved the fabric of this dress, the cut, the length, and the overall look, color and feel. However itâ€™s getting returned because I donâ€™t like how my back looks in it. I wish it was a solid fabric in the back. Highly recommend if you are comfortable showing back rollsðŸ˜ I am 5â€™2â€ 168lbs bought a large and if fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: K.Bianco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid dress for any occasion! 10/10!
items.body: A little over a year ago, I ordered this dress in burnt orange and fell in love with it so much that I ordered the dress again in olive green. Overall rating - 10/10 - and here is why.... Material / Feel: The dress has a simple elegance / classy look to it and you can certainly dress it up or down depending on the occasion you wear it for. The material and quality are just like similar dresses I've seen / received from other brands that sell it for 2x the price, so you are better off getting it from here and saving some money! Fitting / Sizing: Compared to other strapless dresses I own, it is more snug across the chest area, but I actually prefer that a lot because it keeps the ladies secured all night and minimizes the fidgeting / readjusting. It also has a sticky lining across the top, so braless or not, it gives a bit of extra security to keep the ladies in check. I fluctuate between c / d cup, so anything in this size or bigger, I recommend wearing either a strapless bra or tapping / cupping the ladies up to avoid having flattened chest - it may look good from the frontal view, but the side view paints a different picture. If you go braless (for any size cup) / wear it on a cold night / or easily get perky, you may want to consider tapping the nips ... I learned the hard way from a group wedding photo that will forever be documented. For reference, I ordered the orange dress for a wedding in a Large (5'5", 36D, 30W, 40H - 165lbs) and it fit great. I've lost weight since and ordered the green dress in a Medium (5'5", 34C/36D, 27/28W, 37/38H - 135lbs) and again, fits great. Despite losing the weight though, I tried both on the other day for comparison and I can honestly wear either size depending on the fit I want. If I want more of a flowy, less fitted dress that doesn't confirm to my curves / body, I would wear the Large. Still held the girls in and looked great on. If I want a fitted dress that hugs my body and makes it a bit sexier / less casual (IMO), I would wear my recommended sizing - Medium. So depending on your measurements and the fit you are trying to achieve, you can order your recommended sizing OR size up. Read more
items.author: Bianca Medici

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS!
items.body: Such a pretty dress! The material was high quality, soft, and breathable, making it comfortable to wear all day. The fit was absolutely perfect, flattering in all the right places and true to size. I received so many compliments. Read more
items.author: kwesttt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: I wore this dress to my friendâ€™s wedding and it was super cute! It was a bit tight on the sides and I had to be careful with the zipper but once it was on it was fine. Iâ€™m about 150 lbs and I got a size Medium. A large may have fit a little better but this one was still cute and did its job! Read more
items.author: Angel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snags a little
items.body: The dress was very cute on but I expected a little better quality. It snagged super easy before I even wore it once it had 5 snags. I like that the top stayed up the whole time while dancing and I got lots of compliments on how the dress was so cute so overall it was a cute dress that fit well but it was a little cheap. Read more
items.author: Rene lavergne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft satin!
items.body: My DIL got this dress for an upcoming wedding. She said itâ€™s the perfect wedding guest dress and the color is perfect! She got her normal size and it fits like a glove. The zipper is easy to use and it does have a little bit of stretch. More stretch up top and not so much the body of the dress. She sad it's a little bigger on top for her since sheâ€™s not big chested but sheâ€™s still able to keep it up. Read more
items.author: Millie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Aqua, Deep Green, Fuchsia, Peonyred, Liliesblue, Black, Champagne, Orange, Emerald, Goose Yellow, Yellowfloral, Fruit Green, Sapphire Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
